document_data.name: ''Quarrel's Leathers''
document_data.creator: [[Quarrel]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Quarrel's leathers''' was a set of unique [[enchanted]] [[leather armor]] created by an obsessive [[half-drow]] [[warlock]] named [[Quarrel (half-drow)|Quarrel]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: The armor was stitched together from fragments of armor that one was worn by warlock [[Ammon Jerro]], Quarrel's beloved idol. This mismatched armor possessed a ''+2'' enchantment and allowed the wearer to cast the ''[[bestow curse]]'' [[spell]]. The armor could also be only worn by warlocks, half-elves, and those who venerated evil.
document_data.History: ''Quarrel's leathers'' were the warlock's favorite armor. He wore the leathers into battle during the Quarrel's search for the source of Ammon Jerro's arcane powers. The armor accompanied the half-drow across the [[Sword Coast North]], the [[Mere of Dead Men]], and settled for a while in the [[Crossroad Keep]], before setting out for the land of [[Thay]] some years after the {{YearlinkName|1374}}.
